div.p: British Chamber of Commerce.â€”We would call the attention of persons interested in Egyptian trade to the work of the British Chamber of Commerce of Egypt, whose office in Alexandria gives information as to standings trade, &c., to its members, and whose monthly publication reviews our commerce. The annual subscription is 11 and all British traders should become members. Our London office, 36, New Broad- street E.C., acts as London agency to the Chamber.
